channel.title: Tests on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Tests on Game6r

item.title: Game Test cosmetics for girls 12 years old
item.description: This toy is a test that will help you figure out which cosmetics you can’t do without with your character. Answer the questions by choosing the most appropriate answer. Three pictures are attached to each question, but you need to point strictly to one of them. After the end of the test, check the result.

item.title: Game Test for girls 12 years old Your handwriting
item.description: This game will allow you to find out the features of your character, based on handwriting. Images will appear on the screen, and you need to choose those that match your writing. At the end of the test, information based on the answers received will appear. Surely it will be interesting to learn something new about yourself.

item.title: Game Tests for girls Who are you from Ever After High
item.description: During the game for girls Quiz who are you from Ever After High, you have to find out which character of the animated series you are most like. You will be asked to answer ten questions, each containing four possible answers. Choose the item that seems more accurate to you than others. The questions are about your preferences, so it will not be difficult to answer them. And after the test is over, that girl from the magic school Ever After High will appear on the screen, which matches your character.

item.title: Game Tests for girls Who are you from the Barboskins
item.description: A cartoon about a funny dog ​​family fell in love with many. During the game for girls Tests who are you from the Barboskins, you have to find out which of the characters in the animated series you are more like. It can be the coquette Rose, and the athlete Druzhok, and the child prodigy Genka, and the cutie Lisa, and the youngest brother Malysh. Follow the game instructions to get an interesting result in the end.

item.title: Game Tests Witchcraft story
item.description: During the game Tests Witching story, gamers will be able to determine not their character (corresponding to one of the heroines of the series), but girlfriends. That is, according to the results of the test, the computer will determine which of the girls in this series could become your girlfriend. The game is greatly facilitated by the fact that it is completely Russified. So no dictionary is required.

item.title: Sisters Rock Punk Style Contest
item.description: Best friend test for girls offers very simple questions, but thanks to them you can find out how good you are as a friend. All questions relate to your relationship with your girlfriend. Just choose from the three answer options the one that best suits your behavior. After you answer all the questions of the friendship test, the result will be displayed on the screen. You will see detailed information about how you behave in friendships.
